item.title: Adding a staff portal
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:2, topic:274582”]Well I don’t know anything about Deltascape and how their packets work. But for me, it would be this:

case 2765: if (playerRights >= 1) { toX = 3291; toY = 3023; sM("Whatever here"); } else { sM("This portal may only be used by Staff."); } break;

It’s saying anyone who’s rights aren’t 1 or higher will only send them a message. Again, I don’t usually help with Deltascape because I don’t know much about it or how cases work. Try that.[/quote]

Thanks for replying, ill convert this too delta now.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a staff portal
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Well I don’t know anything about Deltascape and how their packets work. But for me, it would be this:

case 2765: if (playerRights >= 1) { toX = 3291; toY = 3023; sM("Whatever here"); } else { sM("This portal may only be used by Staff."); } break;

It’s saying anyone who’s rights aren’t 1 or higher will only send them a message. Again, I don’t usually help with Deltascape because I don’t know much about it or how cases work. Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a staff portal
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

i want too add a staff portal too a certain global object/ door. I am new too java but realise i need too start my code with this

if (playerRights >= 1) {

i am on a deltascape source.

id need this in there too for when they click on the door it teles them there

p.toX = 3291;
p.toY = 3023;

the global object id is 2765.

could anyone piece this code together for me?

Read full topic
